document_title: Penile cancer: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Men who see any signs of penile cancer (mentioned above) or have the following factors should also see a Andrologist regularly:
Have ever had a penile injury, urinary tract infection or genital warts; Foreskin stenosis but not circumcised; Diagnosed with urethral stricture
subsection_title: ung thu duong vat.json. When to see a doctor?
